head.supplied: 12/1/87. ¶ ¶ An other batch of dried Australian plants, dear Mr Carruthers, has been sent through the Melbourne Carriers Firm of Mr Tate to your adress, freight here paid. As this sending contains 63...

div.p: Natural History Museum, London, Museum Archives, D404/5, folder 17, Mueller, Sir FJH von.

An other batch of dried Australian plants, dear Mr Carruthers, has been sent through the Melbourne Carriers Firm of Mr Tate to your adress, freight here paid. As this sending contains 635 spec., it should add many specific forms to your collections there.
